:::{#hero-heading} **Human Factors Consultant | Experimental Psychologist | VR & Simulation Specialist** I help organisations design technology, training, and work systems that fit real human capabilities‚Äîso they are **safer**, **easier to use**, and **more effective in the field**. I am a cognitive experimental psychologist with a background translating research into practical improvements for complex environments. My approach combines **human factors / ergonomics**, **ecologically valid experimentation**, and modern measurement‚Äîusing tools like **virtual reality**, **mobile biosensors**, and **data analytics**‚Äîto understand how people perceive, decide, coordinate, and perform under real-world constraints. I work with labs, companies, and government agencies to reduce human error, improve usability, and strengthen performance‚Äîwithout hype or hand-waving. When the question is ‚ÄúWill this system work for people *in practice*?‚Äù, I help you answer it with evidence. I provide end-to-end [consulting services](consulting.qmd): from problem framing and study design to data collection, analysis, and clear recommendations your team can implement. ## How I Can Help ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ### üß† Human Factors & Usability Evaluation Are users struggling, making errors, or developing workarounds? I evaluate **human‚Äìsystem interaction** to identify where interfaces, procedures, and environments create friction‚Äîthen I deliver actionable fixes. Typical work includes task analysis, workflow mapping, usability testing, cognitive walkthroughs, error analysis, and evidence-based recommendations for safer and more intuitive systems. ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ### ü•Ω VR & Simulation for Human Performance I build and use **high-fidelity VR simulations** that let teams test designs and undergo training in realistic conditions‚Äîbefore products are deployed at scale. I support organisations that want to (a) establish VR capability, (b) prototype and evaluate procedures or interfaces, or (c) develop **bespoke simulations** for human factors research and performance training. ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} ### üìä Experimental Design, Measurement & Data Analysis If you need answers that hold up under scrutiny, I design studies that are **reproducible**, interpretable, and aligned to operational decisions. I build measurement plans, choose appropriate statistical models, and communicate results clearly to technical and non-technical stakeholders. This is ideal for A/B tests, field trials, intervention evaluations, and any situation where you need credible evidence‚Äînot just opinions. ::: :::
